messages.install:
First alpha release of Beyond Reality Farscapes 1.0.0-r1

Farscapes is the next generation of our Beyond Reality mod-pack for Minecraft Forge 1.11.2.

Note that this is currently at an early alpha stage. Be prepared for some world incompatible changes, frequent mod updates, additions or removal.

There is currently no balancing effort yet.

Please consult this changes log or our github commit history for more info.
messages.update:
Yet another update to Beyond Reality Farscapes

Mod-pack is still an early release.

Be prepared to deal with possible world breaking changes, even if we try to avoid this.

Please consult this changelog or our github commit history for more info.

warnings.warning:
⚠ Realistic Terrain Generation is Alpha 1 ⚠

This is a custom build of the 1.11.2-dev branch of RTG from Zeno410.

Please understand that it is very early and there are still a lot of changes that are going to happen, including breaking changes.

Worlds created with the current state of the repo will not likely be compatible with the proper release when it is ready.

Server Owners, Players:

Select RTG for your world types at your own risks.

Please do not report issues or ask for help to the RTG Team!

Optifine

While Optifine can greatly enhance Minecraft performance and visuals; keep in mind it also deeply alters its internal functions.

Players using Optifine:

It is possible that Optifine could interfers with other mods in a bad way: causes visual glitches or crashes.

Please do not report issues, bugs, crash if does not happens without Optifine installed.!

!!! Always test your issues without Optifine installed !!!

mod.name: Minecraft Forge
mod.description: Minecraft Forge is a modding API used by alot of mods.

mod.name: Actually Additions
mod.description: Do you want Automation? Wireless Transport? Better Machines? A cup o' Coffee? Chests? Better Hoppers? Leaf Blowers? Faster Growth? Plants? Well, Actually Additions has all that and a lot more!

mod.name: ActuallyComputers
mod.description: Interaction between ActuallyAdditions machines and OpenComputers functions

mod.name: Advanced Generators
mod.description: Freeform Multiblock generators that produce MJ, RF and EU

mod.name: Akashic Tome
mod.description: The book of books.

mod.name: AngelRing 2 Bauble
mod.description: Make the Extra Utils 2 Angel Ring into a bauble

mod.name: Animania
mod.description: Immersive and realistic animals in Minecraft, with improved models, textures, animation, behaviors, and drops.

mod.name: AppleSkin
mod.description: Adds various food-related HUD improvements

mod.name: Augmented Interactions
mod.description: Interact with the world differently

mod.name: Auto Ore Dictionary Converter
mod.description: Converts specified ore dictionary items automatically or on keybinding.

mod.name: Baubles
mod.description: Adding a touch of bling to Minecraft

mod.name: Better Achievements
mod.description: An improvement to the Achievementscreen

mod.name: Better Builder's Wands
mod.description: Wands that allow placing of multiple blocks at a time

mod.name: Better Foliage
mod.description: Better Foliage is a Forge mod that will make your Minecraft worlds more impressive, mainly by improving how vegetation looks. It is fully compatible with other visual enhancement mods (Optifine, Shaders Mod, Colored Lights Core).

mod.name: Better Fonts
mod.description: OpenType font support for Minecraft

mod.name: BiomeTweaker
mod.description: Used to tweak various characteristics of biomes.

mod.name: Bloodmoon
mod.description: Adds the bloodmoon from terraria to minecraft

mod.name: Botania
mod.description: Botania is a mod that adds nature magic to Minecraft. This time with a fancy number in front.

mod.name: BotaniaVisualizer
mod.description: This mod visualize mana of Botania

mod.name: ChastMob
mod.description: Chast is kawaii

mod.name: Chisel
mod.description: Adds in tons of fancy blocks for decoration, crafted using the Chisel.

mod.name: Chisels & Bits
mod.description: a mod about Sculpting, Decorating and Aesthetics

mod.name: Clipboard
mod.description: A simple clipboard for keeping track of your todo list.

mod.name: Computronics
mod.description: A ComputerCraft/OpenComputers addon mod.

mod.name: Crossroads
mod.description: A Tech and Magic mod

mod.name: Custom Main Menu
mod.description: Allows you to edit the mainmenu using json

mod.name: Custom Ore Generation
mod.description: Allows the player to customize how ore is generated.

mod.name: Default Options
mod.description: A way for modpacks to ship a default (key) configuration without having to include an options.txt file.

mod.name: Default World Generator
mod.description: A small mod to automatically select the default world generator for both single player and servers

mod.name: DiscordChat
mod.description: Forge (server-side only) mod to relay MC chat to Discord and vice versa.

mod.name: Dynamic Surroundings
mod.description: Improving Minecraft's sight and sound experience

mod.name: Embers
mod.description: Dwarven-style Magitech Mod

mod.name: Extra Bit Manipulation
mod.description: Adds extra in-world bit manipulation to the Chisels & Bits mod.

mod.name: Extra Utilities
mod.description: Just a bunch of useful things

mod.name: Fast Leave Decay
mod.description: Makes leave decay faster

mod.name: Foamfix
mod.description: FoamFix is a mod which makes Minecraft go fast - by which I mean use less memory.

mod.name: Forestry
mod.description: Trees, bees and more.

mod.name: Fullscreen Fix
mod.description: Fixes the resizable fullscreen bug.

mod.name: Fullscreen Windowed
mod.description: Activates fullscreen windowed mode for Minecraft

mod.name: GenDustry
mod.description: Adds industrial apiaries, advanced genetic manipulation and mutation (Forestry addon)

mod.name: HelpFixer
mod.description: Fixes the help command from mod derpyness

mod.name: huds
mod.description: Multiple HUD's alle in one mod! Fully configurable with ingame configs!

mod.name: Integrated Dynamics
mod.description: Take full and automated control of your appliances.

mod.name: Integrated Tunnels
mod.description: Transfer other stuff over Integrated Dynamics networks

mod.name: Inventory Tweaks
mod.description: Tweaks to inventory handling for ease of use, including sorting and automatic replacement of broken tools or exhausted stacks of items.

mod.name: Iron Chest
mod.description: New chests with larger sizes, with in-place upgrade items. The feature chest is the crystal chest, which is transparent - some inventory contents are visible without opening the chest

mod.name: JEI Bees
mod.description: Adds JEI recipes that show breeding and products from Forestry bees, trees and butterflies.

mod.name: JourneyMap
mod.description: JourneyMap Unlimited Edition: Real-time map in-game or in a web browser as you explore.

mod.name: Just Enough Items
mod.description: Simple recipe and item helper.

mod.name: Just Enough Resources
mod.description: Adds Resources and Mob Drops to JEI

mod.name: Literal Ascension
mod.description: Adds intuitive solutions for vertical mobility.

mod.name: Login Shield
mod.description: protects users from taking damage between when they login and they can start interacting with the world

mod.name: LootTweaker
mod.description: An addon for CraftTweaker that allows modification of loot tables

mod.name: MalisisDoors
mod.description: Better doors!

mod.name: MalisisSwitches
mod.description: Wireless Switches for Minecraft

mod.name: MineTweaker 3
mod.description: Customize your minecraft experience!

mod.name: Missing Pieces
mod.description: Some blocks I wanted in the game.

mod.name: Morph-o-Tool

mod.name: Morpheus
mod.description: Morpheus is a server-only mod that adds sleep voting to a forge based server. When a player sleeps, all other players in the same dimension are notified so it is easier to coordinate.

mod.name: Mouse Tweaks
mod.description: A mod that enhances the inventory management by adding various additional functions to the usual mouse buttons.

mod.description: Adds over 50 unique pieces of furniture to the game!

mod.name: MusicCraft
mod.description: Musical instruments in Minecraft!

mod.name: Natural Pledge
mod.description: The successor to Botanical Addons from 1.7.

mod.description: In-game NBT editing for Entities and TileEntities

mod.name: Neat
mod.description: Minimalistic Functional Unit Plates for the modern Minecrafter

mod.name: NeoTech
mod.description: Ore Processing

mod.name: NetherPortalFix
mod.description: Ensures correct destinations when travelling back and forth through Nether Portals in Multiplayer.

mod.name: Optifine
mod.description: OptiFine is a Minecraft optimization mod. It allows Minecraft to run faster and look better with full support for HD textures and many configuration options.

mod.name: Ore Dowsing

mod.description: Shows a preview of the block that will be placed

mod.name: Realistic Terrain Generation

mod.name: Reliquary

mod.name: MaryTTS
mod.authors: DFKI’s Language Technology Lab, Saarland University
mod.description: MaryTTS is a free and open-source Text-To-Speech synthesizer. This resource provides: The TTS system iteslf, an English Language File and Voice data, to enable use of the Speech Box in Computronics. MaryTTS installs on the server; no processing happens on the client side, so clients do not necessarily need it, unless you would like to use the Speech Box on a singleplayer instance.
